text:
When using FOP and fo file to convert into PDF using Internet Explorer 5 I get 
a blank page.

Any ideas?
creator: tom.barrand@ansplc.com
christian.geisert@isu-gmbh.de
text:
This is a IE problem

And please provide more information next time.

I'm now just guessing you are using a servlet
Following points could help:
1) Make sure you are setting content-type ("application/pdf")
2) add ".pdf" to the requesting URL
3) Make sure you are setting content-length
   (see Contrib/servlet/src/FopServlet.java)

(will add this to the faq)
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
